rules.content: ~ can't be blocked by creatures with power 3 or greater.
Whenever ~ attacks, exile target creature an opponent controls with mana value X or less, where X is the number of creatures you control with power 2 or less.
When ~ leaves the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Rabbit creature token for each card exiled with it. Then return those cards to the battlefield under their owners' control.
